message.body: I hate you >.<
So does that mean Wednesday's canceled?
no
it's a temporary kind of hate
Oh, okay.
So why do you hate me?
the reasons are many
Huh.
That's unfortunate.
yes, unfortunate for you
Making me feel bad =P
it's not really your fault though
Well, I guess that's good to know.
fortunately I do not hold a grudge
but that doesn't change the fact that I got 6 hrs of sleep
Hey, buddy, you could have signed off at any time.
but you're comments were so interesting
Hm..
But you took a nap before that -.-
I did, that prolly didnt help
Even more reason you can't blame me. =P
it's still your fault though
You brought this all on your self!
I've already decided
I reject your decision.
no matter, you will have to win me back
Well, that shouldn't be hard.
confidence helps
So does being awesome.
confidence at being awesome
How how is your day going, despite your 6 hours of sleep?
it's going going good
Interesting.
that's me being a little bit of a jerk
and by good I mean not terrible
how is it you being a jerk? And I'm glad it's not terrible. ^_^
Liz: How how is your day going, despite your 6 hours of sleep?
me: it's going going good
You know... I re-read what I wrote like twice after you said that, and I read over the double how both times.
some editor you are :-/
You're mean today. ^_^
it's monday
and I am behind on my work...and sleep
Then I won't bother you any more. =P
Im on a break
I actually feel fine. Got up without the alarm, went running, even got to work at a reasonable time
Did better than me.
and work isn't too bad, Im just going to end up working late, which is common for a monday
Did you have to call out of work again?
No, I just ended up getting in late.
From what I can piece together, I woke up, put on my glasses, decided to stay in bed for a few minutes, somehow took off my glasses, and went back to sleep =/
Woke up for real at 8:54, I believe =/
Haven't done that in awhile.
or just dreamed that you woke up and put on your glasses
No, they were on the bed beside me. =|
Never a good idea.
yikes
did you cuddle?
With my glasses? No lol.
I do have like 5 pillows on my bed though.
I have a bunch of pillows but only one on my bed
I am very monogamous with my pillows
Hahah.
I never got around to washing the sheets last night
Probably because you were sleeping on them >.>
well, before I fell asleep
What time did you get back yesterday?
from camping? around 6 I believe
So then you went to sleep... and woke up for a few hours before going back to sleep.
The window of opportunity was kind of small.
it only takes a few minutes to put the sheets
in
the
wash
True.
I miss having laundry machines in house.
I have to carry everything downstairs and outside around a corner >.<
And it takes $1.50 per load per machine
mine are also downstairs
not $1.50 a load, but the pair cost me a grand
This seems really neat
http://www.wired.com/gadgetlab/2010/08/sharpie-reinvents-pen-with-liquid-pencil/
I left my damn phone at home
I did that last week.
Im just thinking of all those calls Im missing...
and txts, ohhh the txts
Sarcasm or just exaggeration? >.>
little of both
Im gonna write what I am listening to right now on itunes. it's john mayer going on a rant
NOT lyrics, just talking
Alright so check it out right
I've tried every approach to living, Ive tried it all
I havent tried every approach
sometimes you have to try every approach to get the same...
Ive tried it all, I bought a bunch of stuff i thought nah
I dont like that ..kinda came in and out of that a couple of times
I thought I would shut myself off, I thought maybe thats cool maybe thats what you have to do to be a genius is you have to be mad
so if you can get mad before the word genius, maybe you can make genius appear
right? That doesnt work either
Im in a pretty good place, I've paced myself pretty well, Im 30, Ive seen alot of cool stuff
I made alot of stuff happen for myself
Thats a really cool sentence when you're in your 20's, "I made it happen for myself"
But all that really means is I've somehow or another found a way to synthesize love
or synthesize soothing, you can't get that...
What im saying is Ive invested with all the approaches except one and it's gonna sound really corny but that's just LOVE
I've done everything in my life that I want to do except just give and feel love for my living
and I don't mean like a roman candle firework hollywood hot pink love I mean like a "I got your BACK" love
That's a nice take on that.
Some of the people that would tell you that they love you are some of people who would be the last to have your back
so Im gonna experiment with this love thing, giving love, feeling love
I know it sounds really corny but its the last thing Ive got to check out before I check out. -JM
I know exactly what he is talking about, and it's a good place to be
It's like you finally understand life enought to be able to enjoy it
I wonder how many people there are who haven't had that feeling before.
prolly most
you have subtle glimpses of it when you're younger but it takes a while before you just feel comfortable in your own life
Even then, I get the sense that most people just kind of half-ass an acceptance of life and then go about living it.
yeah, I think most are just too afraid and settle for something safe
like marriage, kids, family, career, house
Fuck it, I'll settle for that in a few years.
I was going to take some time last night to just sit and write
Yeah, that's what most people say
Life won't be worth living for me if I can't find some sort of family to live it with.
I just feel that that mentality is too restrictive. Not to say that it won't work out that way
I want it to be more natural. I want it to just happen on its own and not always live in fear of it never happening and forcing myself to settle for something
True.
If we lived forever, we could wait as long as it took.
or if we where fertile forever
course there is odoption
Yeah
and adoption
I want to have at least one kid myself... It's an experience I'd prefer not to miss.
I don't know how I feel about fatherhood
I try not to think about it.
I like to think I could live a satisfying life with or without having children of my own
but then sometimes I think I would reget it if I didnt
I think I would always feel unfulfilled.
I do have a slight advantage in time
Just a little.
I can have kids in my 60's if I want
but I wouldn't want that. I honestly wouldnt want to wait more then 10 years or so at this point, and even that is pushing it
and if you had asked me 10 years ago I would have guessed that by now I would be married with children
4-5 years ago I thought I'd be marrying after graduation and starting to have kids around now.
most women think that way
23 - married
25 - first kid
27 - second kid
Fuck that. If we're talking ideals, I want twins (one of each sex) and have them tie everything off right then and there.
I imagine one pregnancy would be enough.
thats not realistic though
=( It could happen.
hell, even the 23-25-27 plan isn't all that realistic
you just can't plan life like that...take it from em
Would have been plenty realistic if the bastard hadn't cheated on me =|
or you could just take it from me
those are the things we cannot predict/control
then again, you could have taken him back
fuck, I have to wait another hour to eat again?
I just got a handful of cereal lol
And no, I couldn't have taken him back. There were other complications.
ok fair enough
like I said, out of our control
It's exactly what I am talking about. Loving life, not because it has gone according to our little plan
but because it hasn't
Right.
and it doesnt matter, it's still good
you make the lemonade, you love the life that you live because it's YOU living it
and it's not all good, but those bad moments help you to appreciate the good ones

happiness is fleeting. People ask you what you want in life, most say happiness. Thats the wrong answer. We all have happiness in our lives sometimes, but it's never going to last the REST of our lives. Bad things will happen again, we will be sad again. Then the good will come back, and it will be all the better
Too bad Im at work, I could write right now
You _are_ writing right now.
Just not in the editorial form.
right
Im chatting
I want to experience the highs and lows with people I care about. Hopefully more highs than lows, but either way it's got to feel better than stranding myself hours away from friends and family.
you live in a major metropolitan area, there are people everywhere
some of them are even worth a damn
I'm sensing that you're trying to make a point.... >.>
It's not about location
I mean to a point it is, but you are here now so you just have to make the best of it.
There are a ton of fantastic people out there, people that can love you and can be loved
"so speak kind to a stranger, 'cause you never know. It just might be an angel come, 'o knockin' at your door." -Ben Harper
My typical friend-finding techniques have failed me in Pennsylvania.
It's not easy
I don't have a lot of friends
but that is mainly due to my own laziness/carelessness
Yeah, that's a big factor for me as well.
and I am ok with it to a degree
I usually find one person that I click really well with, and then infiltrate their circle, branching off as it happens.
gee
Have yet to find adequate initial contact here though.
sounds like a military operation
Operation: Will Someone Please Play With Me?
is there a lot of espionage involved
Not really.
being a good friend is hard work, so I find that I only have room for so many
My best friends are typically pretty low maintenance.
Granted, it probably helps that they're about 600-1000 miles away
umhum
but there is probably someone within a 10 mile radius that is a terrific person and could use a friend like you
And the likelihood of me meeting them is what?
Where will I find them? The grocery store?
craigslist solves everything
I don't think I'm looking for the craigslist kind of friends.. >.>
you just have to put yourself out there (not on craigslist) and it will happen
eventually...maybe
Wow. Apparently there is a "strictly platonic" section of craigslist personals lol
Can't see anything from work though.
yeah, but Im pretty sure they are just looking for sex
they are just discreet about it
Yeah, a lot of the headings from the cache suggest that
"Discreet" yeah...
looking for buds that hang nude - m4m - 33 - (Delco)
XD
Just looking for friends....to fuck
Any women want an amazing body massage tonight? - m4w - 36 - (Philly Burbs, Montco)
sounds innocent enough
Black Man - Nice Size - m4mw - pic
(Why is there a pic??)
Ill message him for you
Stimulating Mentally, & Physically - m4w - 29 - (Philly)
link please!
That one? XD
That reminds me of a message I got on OkC.
Except it was _from_ a couple.
She was huge and he had a mullet and a lazy eye.
I'm not even joking.
so did you hang out?
Uh, no.
I think I did send a polite "thanks, but no thanks" message back.
Don't recall.
see, another missed opportunity

I want a TV, movie, couch potato friend
i like 420, laughing, cooking, and fun!
I spend most of the time nude and you should be cool with that....I would never do anything that would make you uncomfortable though
nudism is just normal to me!
Mmhm
m4w 30 philly

So its 3:45 in the morning and for some reason my eyes are still open. For like the last two days I havent been able to sleep so I decided to do something useful with my time and post on here to see if somebody could keep me company (texting) during these late hours. Here s a little about me, im 20 AA. I love cooking, watching movies (especially horror). I also like hanging out and going to the movies. Im always up for a good debate about things going on in the world...if your interested just send me a email and I ll email you back...:)
P.S. A pic with the email would be great!
w4w - 20 (Germantown Area)
"im 20 AA"?
Is that a bra size or an expression of sobriety? O.o
Or something completely different.
I have no idea
Me neither
fooood
http://www.textsfromlastnight.com/Text-Replies-19398.html
ahahaha
niiiice
I just ate, and already I can't wait to eat again in 3 hrs
I had a handful or two of cereal like 2 hours ago, after having 300 calories of food for lunch @ 12:40 and I don't think I'll eat again until much later
I eat like 15,000 calories a day
That has to be borderline impossible
It's not, but I don't
Im pretty particular about what I eat...except at camp
I had waaaay to much nitrates
lol
I let myself go a bit on the weekends
and I have to avoid sweets like the plague because I will binge
Yeah. That's why I can't make/buy cookies or brownies.
Or doughnuts.
Or candy, really.
In fact, I think the popsicles I started getting a few months ago are really the only thing I manage to pace myself on.
http://www.textsfromlastnight.com/Text-Replies-19326.html
K, Ive got to get back to work. We will have to continue this conversation later
You're a terrible person.
It has taken you far to long to realize this
You assume that verbalizing it is the same as realizing it.
terrible people make a lot of assumptions...it's what we do
Hah.

The reason why I decided to verbalize it now is because conversing with you on morality/religion/etc. has led me to shrug off the restrictions I had placed on my tongue in order to fall in with socially accepted and politically correct norms.
Now I'm upsetting my friends because I find myself somewhat unwilling to accept the meaningless and logically empty platitudes that people state as truth.
And that is why you're a terrible person.
you're welcome
